name: Flight Rising Global Fixes
description: See this page for info, updates, or requests. Makes the FR website darker, more compact, more accessible, and fixes annoyances. - Darkens the entire site. (Compatible with Zoga's theme, see how below) - Widens the entire site. Many pages have been rearranged to fit the wider theme. - Increases the size of items where shrunk, without compromising the rest of the page. - Create a default text color, font, size, or all three on the forums and profile pages. -Removes unnecessary padding. On most modern monitors: All baldwin recipes, all nests, exalt bonuses on the main page, and the first couple of lines of a dragon's bio should now be visible without scrolling. Adds a reduction cheat sheet to baldwin and an element cheat sheet to the coli.
additional_info: Updates: MAY 2020: - Fiona compatible - Minor text fixes - Breed food guide on selective feeding setting - Minor bugfixes DECEMBER DATABASE UPDATE - Minor issues with old code fixed (mainly pagination) - Database is wider and significantly less padded - Elemental effects more visible on coliseum enemies - Apparel and skin previews always full-size - Comments are full width - Item tooltips should be more readable in general - This version has https, so the script is now updated for new URLS - They changed the class for familiars, the script has been updated to reflect that - Pagination should now finally behave itself New bestiary has been given a similar treatment to the rest of the site. Please report any errors to nonyhost.tumblr.com - Six familiars, instead of three, appear per row - Awakened familiars are even more obvious - Bestiary now handles oversized descriptions with a scrollbar - Unowned familiars are more recognisable Now compatible with new pagination. Updates delayed due to technical issues, but some requested features have been added: - An elemental cheat-sheet on the coliseum page, below the canvas - A compatbility contigency for the popular Zoga dark mode (details below, does not work out of the box) - A more thematic wider banner (now enabled by default, instructions on reverting below) - Gaoler genes icons are faded, making it harder to buy them by mistake - A less distracting background for the predict morphology page Additional changes include: - Rearranged the dragon page to make better use of the page width - All item icons now have a larger minimum size for visibility - Places that were previous populated with miniature item icons have been rescaled appropriately - A background image to make the dominance page more readable See here for more information on this update and how to enable Zoga compatibility.
